scripts.test: npm run lint #&& prova -b -q -e -l chrome test/index.js
scripts.note1: we can't have nice things. prepublish also runs on npm install https://github.com/npm/npm/issues/6394
scripts.prePublish: npm run requireGitClean && npm prune && npm run nsp && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc
scripts.lint: npm run jshint && npm run jscs
scripts.dmn: dmn gen -f . && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add .npmignore && git commit --no-verify -m'update npmignore'; fi
scripts.doctoc: doctoc README.md && doctoc CONTRIBUTING.md && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add README.md CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit --no-verify -m'table of contents update'; fi
scripts.note3: npm script args kinda suck, we need to deal them in a real script

config.notes: important to correct the path of npm so that the git hook doesn't error

ghooks.pre-push: PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin && npm run nsp && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc && npm test
